abstract: Baseball Roundup; Detroit Tigers beat Cleveland Indians, 8-5, improving to 6-0 for first time in 30 years; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Cabrera homered twice and drove in four runs Sunday as Detroit improved to 6-0 for the first time in 30 years.

headline.main: Miguel Cabrera’s Bat Helps Keep Tigers Unbeaten
headline.print_headline: Cabrera’s Bat Helps Keep Tigers Unbeaten

snippet: Cabrera homered twice and drove in four runs Sunday as Detroit improved to 6-0 for the first time in 30 years.
